N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8600.2 - Public hearings

State Regulations
(a) The
agencies whose permits are subject to this Part and any interested party shall
have the right to present oral or written testimony to the Director of the

Office of Business Permits or his designee regarding the inclusion, exclusion
or addition of agencies or their permits to the master application procedure. Such testimony will be presented at a public hearing at which a record shall be
made. (b) Notice of such hearing
shall be filed in the State Register at least 30 days prior to the hearing
along with the proposed agency action. The hearing shall be conducted in a
manner consistent with the provisions of the State Administrative Procedure
